attributes.review: I got this app to support our glorious leader, but the liberals must have hacked it and are trying to steal my identity!! Don’t download, you’ve been warned!!
attributes.title: The liberals are at it again!

attributes.review: This app is for clowns that love fake news given to them by a Cheeto puff dictator. If you want news that is totally biased and supports systematic racism then oh boy is this app for all you little racist Karens and Richards.
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!!

attributes.review: I wanted to get this app to support our lord Donald but it kept asking for my mother’s maiden name? And the krabby formula patty secret formula? I’m in shock of how unprofessional this app is if I could give it 0- I would absolutely gross.
attributes.title: Absolutely DISGUSTED

attributes.review: I’ve never been so grossed out in my life. I joined the app but was soon berated with pictures of this orange monster. I tried my hardest to ignore it but every time I closed my eyes I saw the orange BEAST.
attributes.title: Disgusting!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it seemed fake to me, it’s far too fake for my liking it’s as if this is some sort of Russian spyware. Anyways Mr. Bunker Baby is a phony, let him get back to his covfefe.
attributes.title: Fake news

attributes.review: Everytime I open the app, it glitches. The leaked nudes of Donald trump keeps popping up on the screen and I can’t believe micro pen15s existed, I thought that was just a myth.
attributes.title: Glitch

attributes.review: I was really excited to see this app and finally learn enough about god’s chosen dictator. I just wanted to know his favorite bible verse!!! Mine’s 1 Timothy 6:10 and I wanted his input :/
attributes.title: Not enough bibles!!

attributes.review: by far the worst app on this platform, unresponsive, doesn't come when i ring the bell, child tracking, horrible app
attributes.title: Worst App

attributes.review: So I was just downloading it right then I open it and it was a Cheeto😿so anyways trump 2020🤩🥺✨but in a gravestone🧚🏼💞✨also heard his birthday is coming up so happy birthday obama🥳🥳anyways Anonymous 2020🇺🇸
attributes.title: It the best app😛❄️✨💞if you are hellen Keller🧚🏼🥺✨🤩

attributes.review: Doesn’t work from the bunker. I’m shocked they didn’t realize this during the testing and reviewing of the app.
attributes.title: Bunker problems
